description: Musician and film star Kris Kristofferson has died at age 88. His hit songs include "Me and Bobby McGee" and he starred in dozens of films, including A Star Is Born, opposite Barbra Streisand.
title: Kris Kristofferson, musical rebel and movie star, has died at age 88

description: NPR steps back and takes a closer look at the days leading up to the killing of Hezbollah's leader. Experts say this development has transformed an already complex and deadly conflict.
title: From pager blasts to Nasrallah’s killing: 12 days that transformed a bloody conflict
